auth.signupCompleteMessage:
A verification link has been sent to your email.
Please check your email to activate your account.
auth.minPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.minName: Name must be at least 2 characters

landing.heroDescription: Discover the core principles of prompt engineering through Socratic dialogue. Apply them directly to policy learning and research.
landing.freeForStudents: Free for all KDI School students
landing.curriculumDescription: Curriculum designed for policy graduate students
landing.ctaDescription: Build your prompt engineering skills and improve the efficiency of policy research. Socrates is waiting for you.

module1.title: Good Questions Lead to Good Answers
module1.description: Experience how prompts affect AI response quality

module2.title: Effective Literature Review
module2.description: Write effective prompts for academic literature search, summary, and organization

module3.title: Requesting Policy Comparison Analysis
module3.description: Structured prompts for cross-country/policy comparison analysis

module4.title: Getting Help with Data Interpretation
module4.description: Effectively utilize AI for statistical data interpretation and visualization suggestions

module5.title: Getting Support for Policy Document Writing
module5.description: Support for writing practical documents such as briefings, policy memos, and proposals

step1.title: Socratic Dialogue
step1.description: Discover principles through AI tutor's guided questions

step2.title: Prompt Writing
step2.description: Write prompts tailored to policy scenarios

step3.title: Comparison Lab
step3.description: Compare your prompts with improved versions

step4.title: Reflection Journal
step4.description: Organize what you learned and apply it

socratic.errorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred while generating a response. Please try again.
socratic.completeMessage: Click the 'Next Step' button in the top right to proceed to prompt writing.
socratic.hintDescription: If you're having trouble answering, check the hints.
socratic.learningDescription: You can understand the core concepts by having about {count} exchanges with the AI tutor.
socratic.canProceed: If you've had enough conversation, you can proceed by clicking the 'Next Step' button!

initialQuestions.module1:
Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Today we'll explore "Good Questions Lead to Good Answers" together.

Before we start, I have a question: When asking questions to AI, why do you think specific questions are important?

Feel free to answer as you think. There's no right answer! ðŸ™‚
initialQuestions.module2:
Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Today we'll talk about literature review using AI.

First, a question: When reading and summarizing literature, how should you ask AI for help?

If you've tried it before, that's great too!
initialQuestions.module3:
Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Today's topic is policy comparison analysis.

Let me ask you right away: If comparing policies between two countries, what criteria would be fair for comparison?

For example, think about comparing birth policies between Korea and Japan.
initialQuestions.module4:
Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Today we'll explore data interpretation together.

I have a question: When looking at and analyzing data, where do you think AI's help is most needed?

Feel free to share your personal experience or thoughts.
initialQuestions.module5:
Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Today we'll talk about policy document writing.

First, a question: What is the most difficult part when writing policy documents?

Structure, logical flow, sentence refinement... anything is fine.

module1: Think about the difference between vague questions and specific questions
What information does AI need to understand context?
Think about the components of a good question
module2: Think about how to identify the core arguments of literature
What criteria are needed when comparing multiple pieces of literature?
Consider how to evaluate the reliability of literature
module3: Think about indicators for measuring policy effectiveness
Think about systematic methods for analyzing policy pros and cons
module4: Think about ways to find patterns and trends in data
Consider the difference between statistical significance and practical significance
Think about the importance of data visualization
module5: Think about the structure and logical flow of policy documents
Think about writing methods considering the target audience
Consider ways to make compelling arguments

dashboard.subtitle: Continue building your prompt engineering skills today.
dashboard.learningModulesDescription: Learn {count} modules in order to build your prompt engineering skills

modules.title: Learning Modules
modules.description: Learn {count} modules in order to build your prompt engineering skills

resources.title: Learning Resources
resources.description: We provide various resources to help you learn prompt engineering
resources.tryDifferentSearch: Try different search terms or filters

openaiGuide.title: OpenAI Prompt Engineering Guide
openaiGuide.description: A guide to writing prompts based on OpenAI official documentation.

anthropicGuide.title: Anthropic Claude Official Prompt Guide
anthropicGuide.description: Official guide explaining Claude model characteristics and effective prompt writing methods.

chainOfThought.title: Chain of Thought Prompting
chainOfThought.description: Explains step-by-step thinking techniques for complex reasoning tasks.

fewShotLearning.title: Few-shot Learning Prompt Strategy
fewShotLearning.description: Covers methods to improve AI output quality using examples.

aiEthics.title: AI Ethics and Responsible Use
aiEthics.description: Introduces ethical considerations and best practices when using AI.

journals.completeModuleToWrite: Complete module learning and write a reflection journal
